platformDescription: Environmental and climate monitoring platform based on Google Earth Engine for geospatial data analysis and prediction.

auth.register_subtitle: Join us to monitor the environment

password_security.title: Tips for a secure password:
password_security.mix_upper_lower_numbers_symbols: Mix uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols
password_security.avoid_common_words: Avoid common words or personal information
password_security.unique_password: Do not reuse this password elsewhere

validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.password_number: Password must contain at least one number
validation.password_special: Password must contain at least one special character
validation.terms_required: You must accept the terms of service

errors.rate_limit_exceeded: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

descriptions.ai_assistant_development: We're working on bringing you an intelligent assistant for environmental data analysis.
descriptions.export_tools_description: Tools for exporting data and generating reports will be available here.
descriptions.calendar_events_description: Schedule and track environmental monitoring events and activities.
descriptions.reports_coming_soon: Detailed environmental monitoring reports will be available here.
descriptions.history_logs_description: View historical environmental data and system activity logs.
descriptions.settings_panel_description: Configure your application preferences and account settings.
descriptions.help_documentation_description: Find help, documentation, and support resources for the platform.
descriptions.temperature_monitoring_description: Monitor and analyze temperature patterns and trends.
descriptions.precipitation_monitoring_description: Track rainfall and precipitation patterns across monitored regions.
descriptions.page_not_found_description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
descriptions.please_wait: Please wait while we sign you in.

vegetation.title: Vegetation Data
vegetation.description: Monitor and analyze vegetation patterns and health indicators
vegetation.content_description: Vegetation monitoring tools and NDVI analysis will be available here. Track forest health, crop conditions, and vegetation changes over time.
vegetation.ndvi_description: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index monitoring and analysis
vegetation.health_description: Monitor forest and crop health indicators across regions
vegetation.change_description: Detect and track vegetation changes over time periods

temperature.title: Temperature Data
temperature.description: Monitor and analyze temperature patterns and trends
temperature.content_description: Temperature monitoring and analysis tools will be available here. Track temperature variations, heat patterns, and climate trends.
temperature.trends_description: Analyze long-term temperature patterns and seasonal variations
temperature.heatmaps_description: Visualize temperature distribution across geographic regions
temperature.anomaly_description: Identify unusual temperature events and climate anomalies

precipitation.title: Precipitation Data
precipitation.description: Track rainfall and precipitation patterns across monitored regions
precipitation.content_description: Precipitation monitoring and rainfall analysis tools will be available here. Track rainfall patterns, drought conditions, and water cycle dynamics.
precipitation.rainfall_description: Monitor daily, monthly, and seasonal rainfall patterns
precipitation.drought_description: Track drought conditions and water stress indicators
precipitation.flood_description: Analyze precipitation levels for flood risk evaluation

export.title: Export Tools
export.description: Export environmental data and generate reports
export.content_description: Data export tools and report generation features will be available here. Export environmental data in various formats and create custom reports.
export.data_description: Export environmental data in CSV, JSON, and other formats
export.report_description: Generate custom PDF reports with charts and analysis
export.batch_description: Process and export large datasets efficiently
